SEARCH
Package org.example.attendancelist.repository

Interface StudentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Student,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Student,Integer>
public interface StudentRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Student,Integer>
Repository interface for managing students. This interface extends CrudRepository to provide basic CRUD operations for the Student entity.
See Also:
  • CrudRepository
  • Student

      Iterable<Student> findByNameAndSurnameAndGroupId(String name, String surname, Integer groupId)

      name - The name of the student.
      surname - The surname of the student.
      groupId - The ID of the group to which the student belongs.

    • updateGroupIdToNull

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE Student s SET s.group.id = NULL WHERE s.group.id = :groupId") void updateGroupIdToNull(@Param("groupId") Integer groupId)
      Updates the group ID to NULL for students belonging to a specified group.
      Parameters:
      groupId - The ID of the group.
